Onyeka Nwelue onye amụrụ na abalị iri-atọ na otu n’ọnwa mbụ n'afọ 1988, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye  edemede nke Naijiria, onye akwụkwọ ya bụ Hip-Hop bu nani  maka umuaka,ma turu ugo  dịka ode akụkọ mere eme na 2015  nke Nigerian Writers ’Awards

Ọ gbanwere akwụkwọ akụkọ ya, Island of Happiness dịka ihe nkiri n’asụsụ Igbo, dịka Agwaetiti Obiụtọ wee merie Best Feature Film site n’aka onye ntụzịaka na 2018 Newark International Film Festival , a gakwara n'ihu ịhọpụta ya maka Best First Feature film nke Onye ntuziaka ya na nrite Ousmane Sembene maka Ihe Nkiri Kachasị Mma n'Asụsụ Afrika na 2018 Africa Movie Academy Awards
Ihe nkiri Island of Happiness bụ mkpali mmụọ gbasara ezi ihe mere na Oguta
Ọ bụ ya guzobere La Cave Musik, aha ndekọ, nke dị na Paris
Nwelue gụrụ Sociology & Anthropology na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka wee nweta onyinye ọzụzụ mmụta ịgụmaka ntuziaka na Prague Film School na Czech Republic
Ugbu a ọ bụ osote prọfesọ na- eleta na Onye Nleta Ọmụma nke Africa literature  na ọmụmụ ihe na Ngalaba Asụsụ Bekee nke Ngalaba nke humanities, Mahadum Manipur na Imphal, India
Ọ bụ onye nleta nyocha na Center for International Studies, Mahadum Ohio , ebe ọ gburu oge na Atens, Ohio.
A hopụtara  akwụkwọ akụkọ ya nke abụọ, maka akara ANA Prose Fiction Prize na 2018 ya na nchịkọta abụ ya, The Lagos Cuban Jazz Club, bụ ndị edepụtara aha maka ANA Poetry Prize n'otu afọ ahụ
A mụrụ Onyeka Nwelue na Ezeoke Nsu na Ehime Mbano na Imo State, Naịjirịa nye  Honorable Sam Nwelue, onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na Knight nke St
Christopher na Lady Catherine Nwelue, onye nkuzi na Lay Reader.
A mụrụ ya  n'ime ezinụlọ nke nọ na ogo dị elu, ọ bụ nwa nke anọ n'ime ụmụ isii nne na nna ya

Nne ya, onye a zụlitere n'ezina ụlọ ndị ama ama n'ọchịchị nke Obua Ajukwu (Ndanike), nke Oguta, bụ nwa nwanne nna Flora Nwapa, nke a na-ahụkarì dịka nwanyị Africa mbụ dere akwụkwọ nke ebipụtara na mba ụwa.

Ndị nne na nna ya ochie bụ Origbudu SBC Obiora na Ogbuefi Odiso Obiora (née Nwakuche na nwanne nwanyị nke okenye bụ Maazị Gogo Nwakuche , di Nwapa nke abụọNwanne mama ya nke nwanyị, Prọfesọ Leslye Obiora, bụbu oṅye minista Naịjirịa n'ihe gbasara steel na mines
Nwelu gara Lagos mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii ịga Ememe Wole Soyinka , emesịa akowaara Noble laureate bụ Soyinka onye ọ bụ
Afọ ole na ole ka nke ahụ gasịrị, Nwelue gara India maka emume nke abụọ maka International Writers festival ’,site n'ọkpụkpọ òkù nke India Cultural Association
Nobel Laureate, Wole Soyinka ka bụ otu n'ime ndị  onye nkwalite Nwelue  dịka Nwelue kwuru,"Ọ gụọla ihe niile m bipụtara,"
O haziela nyocha nkeonwe   nke ihe nkiri ya maka Nobel Laureate.
A kowara ya dịka onye nkwado ụmụ nwanyị N'okwụ gbasara nkwuchite ọnụ ụmụ nwanyị
N'ajụjụ ọnụ, mgbe emechara The house of Nwapa, ọ sịrị: "Emere' The house of  Nwapa', n'ihi na abụ m onye nkwuchite ọnụ Ụmụ nwanyị
Ekwenyere m na anyị niile hà nhata
Na mbido ọrụ ya, Nwelue dere maka The Guardian na Naịjirịa, ohere ndapụta nke Jahman Anikulapo nyere ya , onye nchịkọta/nhazi akụkọ nke Sunday Edition nke a maara dịka The Guardian na Sọnde
Nwelue na-anọchi anya onye na- ede akwụkwọ ọgụgụ, Priya Doraswamy nke Lotus Lane Literary Agency, nke dị na New Jersey
N’afọ 2012, Debbie Edwards nke Debbie Edwards Talent Management, bụ onye njikwa ya
Nwelue bidoro ide edemede mbụ ya, The Abyssinian Boy mgbe ọ nọ n’India
Akwụkwọ ahụ kọwaturu ihe ọ hụrụ na India dị ka onye ojii, mbipụta ya gosipụtara Nwelue dịka onye ama ama na mba ụwa
The Abyssinia Boy nwetara ntụle dị egwu na isi akwụkwọ akụkọ Naịjirịa na India dịka ("akụkọ Greek")  na Hindu ("the Indian ethos are original").

Akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya bụ akụkọ n'amaokwu  ma onye ọdee abụ Britain-Hungaria bụ George Szirtes kọwara ya dịka "breathless".Nwelue gazuru ala iri-abuo n’ise na Europe n’afo 2014, n’ịkwalite akwụkwọ a, asụgharịrị  ya n’asusu Italia, Spanish, Igbo na Yoruba
Nsụgharị a bụ site n'aka onye edemede Venezuelan bụ Alberto Quero, e bipụtara ya na Peru, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ ya na Cusco Book Fair na 2015

Nwelue sooro ndị egwu na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru La Cave Musik wee gaa mba dị iche iche iji zute ndị egwu dị iche iche ma wepụta akwụkwọ ḿgbaha kowara ọtụtụ ihe, nke na-akọwapụta nzụkọ ya onye na ndị egwu na ndị na-akwalite egwu
E wepụtara ya na Jenụwarị 2015 ka ọtụtụ kwadoro ya
E kwupụtara n'erelari otu nde
O weputara otu ihe omuma nke kowara ndụ Flora Nwapa, nwanyị Afrịka mbụ dere  akwụkwọ  n’olu bekee
A họpụtara ya dịka akwụkwọ ederede ihe ọmụma kachasi nke 2017 Africa Movie Academy Awards
Na ngwụcha ọnwa Ọgọstụ, afọ 2017, Nwelue kwuputara site na edemede  na o kechiri ihe nkiri nke ọhụụ ya, "Island of Happiness, nke sitere na obere akụkọ n'ewepụtabeghi
Ka afọ asaa nke DADA Books bipụtara The Boy Abyssinian, Nwelue bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ ọhụụ bụ'The Beginning of Everything Colourful
Mgbe ọ laghachiri India, Nwelue debara na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka, iji mụọ Sociology & Anthropology
Ọ gara n'ihu na-amụ Akwụkwọ  maka edemede akụkọ  na Asia School of Media Studies na Noida, India, mgbe nke a gasịrị, ọ kuziri Ntuziaka Ihe nkiri na Center for Research in Art of Film & TV (CRAFT)

O lekọtara Sandwich Class nke English Language Department nke Mahadum Lagos dịka ọ  na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke FilmAfrique, ihe mmalite nke ihe nkiri Afrika, nke Africa Film Academy bipụtara, ndị na-elekọta Africa Movie Academy Awards
E nyere ya ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ onye ntuziaka n'efu na Prague Film School na Czech Republic
Kemgbe ọganihu nke akwụkwọ akụkọ ya ,Nwelue sonyere dee ihe nkiri Namaste Naija, nke Teco Benson duziri wee mee ya na Hyderabad na Lagos ma bụrụ nke Lilian Bach mepụtara
O sokwa chepụta  echiche obere ihe nkiri, The Beginning of Everything Colourful ya na onye omee Britain na onye nlere anya ejiji Dudley O'Shaughnessy
Na mbido afọ 2012, e debanyere Nwelue na Pontas Agency na Spain
Ọ tọrọ ntọala Blue & Hills Consultancy, nke ọ na-elekọta La Cave Musik
Site na Blue & Hills, egosipụtara ya na MTV Meets MTN ya na Ben Mụrray BruceNdị ọrụ Nwelue haziri Bayelsa Book & Craft Fair nke mbụ na mbụ ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye ntụzi
Ọ malitekwara idezi na ibipụta FilmAfrique, bụ ihe nkiri mbụ na sinima Afrika, nke ndị nyere Nkwado ego bụ  Africa Film Academy, ndị na-ahụ maka nhazi  ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy (AMAA).
N’ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2016, ihe nkiri Nwelue dere maka Flora Nwapa, nke akpọrọ The House of Nwapa, bidoro na Harare, Zimbabwe
Kemgbe o biputere The Abyssinian Boy na 2009, Nwelue jiiri otutu oge ya kwuo okwu na mmemme, emume na ọgbakọ dị iche iche.
Ka a kpọchara ya na emume agụmagụ nke Man Hong Kong, a jụrụ  ịnye Nwelue visa na Hong Kong, nke butere itimkpu ndị mgbasa ozi, ihe kpatara nke bụ ikpaoke ọdịdị  anụahụ ya
Agbanwere mkpebi ahụ ma ọ nwetara visa ịga ememme ahụ
N’afọ 2017, ụmụ nwoke ndị agha mekpara Nwelue ahu n’ihi na ọ chọrọ igbochi ha idina onye ji ahụ ya achụnta ego n'ike
Otu afọ mgbe nke a gasịrị, e jidere Nwelue n'ụlọ ezumike nke Onomo Hotel na Kigali wee tụọ ya mkpọrọ ụbọchị asatọ, maka ebubo 'na-okparịrị  Onye isi ala Rwandan, Paul Kagame na Twita na RwandAir
A tọhapụrụ ya site na ntinye ọnụ nke onye isi ala Naịjirịa, Olusegun Obasanjo
Tupu e jide ya, ọ bụ onye nkuzi afọ ofufo na Kwetu Film Instịtut, nke onye na-emepụtai ihe nkiri, Eric Kabera  hiwere.
N'ọnwa mbụ nke February 2018, ka oji otu ụbọchị gafee ụbọchị ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri atọ  ya , Onyeka nwere ihe mberede okporo ụzọ, nke o nwetara ọtụtụ mmerụ ahụ na mgbara azụ ya
Ọ nọ na oche ọlụsị ọnwa abụọ,tupu ojiri ihe eji enyere njem aka eme njem.
